pullRequest.title: Page level error handling
pullRequest.bodyText:
Some major changes as part of this PR:

Handled page level error handling when namespace is not available across the UI.
Emit events when namespace call fails so we can disable parts of the UI.
Added custom refresh function when namespace is not available to retrieve the namespace
Added custom refresh function as prop to 500 component
Use message prop instead of secondary title (We have encountered an error….) when available.
Removed ErrorMessageContainer in Wrangler and replaced it with 500 component for consistent experience.

nodes.bodyText: rather than wrapping all components individually with ErrorBoundary, can we just create a wrapper component for Route that will add this ErrorBoundary implicitly?

nodes.bodyText: We don't need to set state if there is no workspaceError. Will avoid re-renders in UI.
Are we replacing all setDataError to setWorkspaceError? I now don't see this event being emitted anywhere.
Seems like duplicate code. Can we export it as a common utility function and use it here?
Is this even a function in namespace api?
Also why do we need to poll for the list of namespaces?
Have simple variable name. retrieving sounds like its still doing it. isNamespaceFetchInFlight may be?
